concept.title: Custom DPFs
concept.shortdesc: A custom DPF is a DPF you develop especially to process your organization's data.

conbody.p: includes a library of helper functions to simplify DPF development. DPFs can be developed in either Java or Python, or can be extended to support DPF development in any modern programming language that runs on a Linux OS. No MapReduce or YARN knowledge is necessary. Your DPF can be written by PHEMI, by your organizationâ€™s in-house programmers, or by third-party developers. Training in DPF development is also available from PHEMI.
